predicate.note: Frames file for 'grab' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: transitive with adverbials
example.text: Likewise , in the U.S. , Nissan has grabbed 5.2 % of the car market so far this year , up from 4.5 % a year ago .

example.name: simply transitive
example.text: But such convolutions would still block the networks from [*-1] grabbing a big chunk of the riches of syndication .
example.arg: a big chunk of the riches of syndication
